description: The government says it wants to promote "wellbeing and gender equality".
title: Finland to give dads same parental leave as mums
title_page: Finland to give dads same parental leave as mums - BBC News
maintext: Finnish Prime Minister Sanna Marin said last month that her country still had some way to go to achieve gender equality, and complained that too few fathers were spending time with their children when they were young.
